title: [openblas] Build error on x64-linux

labels.name: category:port-bug
labels.description: The issue is with a library, which is something the port should already support

body:
Package: openblas:x64-linux@0.3.27

**Host Environment**

- Host: x64-linux
- Compiler: GNU 14.1.1
-    vcpkg-tool version: 2024-04-23-d6945642ee5c3076addd1a42c331bbf4cfc97457
    vcpkg-scripts version: bd2b54836 2024-05-14 (13 hours ago)

**To Reproduce**

`vcpkg install `
